description:
An open-source alternative to Claude Cowork, powered by OpenCode

OpenWork is an extensible, open-source “Claude Work” style system for knowledge workers.
It’s a native desktop app that runs OpenCode under the hood, but presents it as a clean, guided workflow:
- pick a workspace
- start a run
- watch progress + plan updates
- approve permissions when needed
- reuse what works (templates + skills)
The goal: make “agentic work” feel like a product, not a terminal.
Highlights
- Improved worker creation reliability in sandbox mode, including better cleanup tooling when setup gets stuck.
- Kept the create-worker modal in a loading state until session handoff completes, reducing premature UI transitions.
Fixes & polish
- Follow-up sandbox flow hardening across app and desktop orchestrator integration.
- Version bump and package alignment for 0.11.83.
- AUR packaging updated for this release line.
Packaging / ops
- Release pipeline completed for tag v0.11.83.
